name: Thrashcore
description: Fast tempos, brief song structures, and the occasional use of blast beats.

children.name: Powerviolence
children.description: Originated from the West Coast California Hardcore Punk scene in the late 1980s, utilizing strong elements of Noise Rock and abrupt tempo changes.
